A nice refuge for the CS players who are tired of CS:GO.
[u]Notable Features:[/u]
[list]
[*] It's like CS 1.6, but with Source physics.
[*] Nice chunk of achievements; most can be solo-ed on servers.
[*] Many, many mods to choose from; maps, modes, reskins, and more.*
- Thanks to the modding capacity, the community is relatively fun.
[/list]
*Mods are primarily found through Game Banana. That figures.
Pretty fun, still many active servers around. If you want to get into CS, this is the game for you. For real men who don't accept CS:GO
